# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance from another gesture.

## Declaration

```swift
init<T>(_ gesture: T) where Value == T.Value, T : Gesture
```

## Parameters

- **gesture**: A gesture that you use to create a new gesture.
title: init(_:)
